title: John Albert Gardner // 41
description:
When two girls go missing within just one year in San Diego County, California, the entire community bands together to find them. In 2010, police discover that a local sex offender could be behind it all. This is the case of Amber Dubois, Chelsea King, and John Albert Gardner.

Get 10% off your Vampire Wine order at vampire.com using promo code GOINGWEST at checkout! These incredible wines are perfect for a Halloween party or just a Fall night in.

**Case Sources**
https://www.websleuths.com/forums/threads/male-seen-walking-with-near-amber-on-feb-13-2009.97325/page-2

https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/sdut-escondido-where-is-amber-dubois-2010feb13-story.html

https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/news/education/sdut-amber-dubois-lamb-escondido-high-school-2016may24-story.html

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/taken-the-amber-dubois-story-10-08-2011/

https://www.voiceofsandiego.org/topics/news/a-robbery-that-was-really-an-attempted-rape/

https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/pomerado-news/sdpn-guilty-gardner-confesses-to-killing-chelsea-amber-2010apr17-story.html
